about.title: what are we doing here?
features: 1 at the moment you were born, the configuration of the universe was in a specific state â€” one that could only be reproduced if the universe had an infinite amount of time
2 this state acts as a map, composed of a vast set of variables that determine all the attributes shaping your existence
3 we will use this cosmic blueprint to unlock the secrets of the past and forecast the future, using LILIT's unique new language of the stars
